Description: Super cute 2 bedroom in Southie for a great price! Complete with in unit laundry, a large living area, and tons of closet space / storage, this apartment offers the best of South Boston with easy access to parks and greenery as well as walking distance to the water! It has lots of charm in the entryways, and is just a block away from Broadway St. and all the shops, restaurants, grocery stores, and bars Southie has to offer!
